text: During a visit to the Hyde Park Academy in the city, several teenage girls were drawn to Prince Harry with one asking him to eat Chicago ’ s famous style of pizza. She said : “ When Prince Harry ’ s here, he eats Chicago — make sure he has a pizza. ” To which the royal revealed his shocking dietary revelation. He replied : “ I had pizza last night. I don ’ t even eat pizza anymore, but I had pizza last night. GETTY Prince Harry has revealed another secret about his dietary habits on a visit to Chicago “ We had deep dish, and we had thin crust. “ I promise you, I will make sure I eat Chicago. ” As well as discussing his dietary details with the people of Chicago, the prince also stated his belief that young people hold ` ` the solutions to
